website_summaries.verdict: Backpacking in the Salomon Quest 4D 3 GTX means experiencing the great outdoors in dry comfort. Users are also provided with excellent ankle support and stability. Even with its long list of benefits, it was able to keep its weight low.That said, the boot has been reported to have subpar interior ventilation. Overall, the Quest 4D 3 GTX is generally appreciated for its positive qualities, but potential buyers should not expect much when it comes to breathability.
pros: Gear bloggers rave about the Quest 4D 3 GTX’s fantastic surface grip over a variety of surfaces
This Salomon boot racks tons of praises from professional reviewers for its outstanding ankle support
Many owners feel quite agile and light wearing this backpacking footgear
The Salomon Quest 4D 3 GTX hiking boots impress shoe critics with their otherworldly level of comfort
Numerous users, including seasoned product testers, adore the boot’s A-grade waterproofing
A group of product testers gives it a high score on stability
The virtually non-existent break-in period of the Salomon Quest 4D 3 GTX is received positively by umpteen backpackers
Plenty of experienced hikers laud its performance even on wintry conditions
cons: Its mid-section is narrow, according to a handful of wearers
Footwear critics struggle with the Quest 4D 3 GTX’s inability to stay cool in warmer conditions
The hefty price tag of this backpacking gear disappoints a reputable shoe blogger and several online buyers
A couple of disappointed verified purchasers comment that the sole peels away from the rest of the boot too soon

customer_reviews.title: Makes wet rocks, wood, or leaves feel like ice!
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this boot! Many reviews say the grip is excellent, in the wet, but I, and others, have found them to be very dangerous with terrible grip on wet surfaces. In eight days of walking, I slipped six times and fell three times despite taking extra care - and this while carrying my heavy and expensive camera gear. I'm lucky that I didn't get seriously injured though there was quite a bjt of blood on one occassion. There seems to be a manufacturing inconsistency which Salomon refuse to accept and I'm now having to use the Sale of Goods Act to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Vip

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: I'm now on my 3rd pair, they really are great, comfortable straight out of the box, waterproof boots. The reason I give them 4 stars instead of 5 is that I can only get 18 months out of them - so I only buy them when they are on offer, I wouldn't pay 150 quid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: These boots are empowering.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are empowering. You put them on and you just want to do stuff, get out and explore, take on a crazy challenge. They feel extremely well built and very, very stable. My only criticism is that, for someone with widish feet, they do feel a touch narrow, but for the average width foot, I doubt you could get any better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of boots I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: Brought these to use on a hiking holiday later in the year. I am a size 12.5 (uk) and ordered the 13.5. Arrived on time and in good condition. The fit with a thin liner sock and a wool walking sock is superb. I genuinely have never worn a more comfortable pair of boots. Early days but 4 20k walks and they are terrific. The weather has been very wet so I have trudged through the usual mud water and sopping wet grass and bone dry feet. All holding together and the locking laces keep the footbed well grounded. Brilliant
customer_reviews.author: davidiafrica

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to waffle on the way some folks do, these boots are great in every way, i have 3 pairs (different colors), superbly comfortable, 100% waterproof, great fit (mine are 11 UK) and very tough. I can't fault this seller, they arrived 3 days late but that's not their fault - it's DPD who i'm told are a lazy shower, cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Fergus

customer_reviews.title: comfortable straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: great hiking boots.. comfortable straight out of the box, solid but not too heavy.. great grip even on slippy surfaces.. fantastic all round boot for rugged terrain. Edit - I've had these over a year now and they've been everywhere. Serious trekking in the Picos de Europa in Spain and a long-distance trek in Nepal. Never once had a problem with them even when carrying heavy loads. Still super comfortable, great grip, whenever they finally wear out I'll be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my husband for every day use at work. He is on his feet all day. After foot surgery a few years ago - he is in constant pain. These are the first shoes he's come home with at the end of the day and said they were great. Very sturdy and great ankle support. Excellent materials used in manufacturing. We will be ordering a another pair soon to keep as spare. And maybe some ladies ones for me as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lankie Young

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow, hurts your feet
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 boot, always have, these boots are a very narrow 11 not like any of the magnum boots I've worn. Made my feet throb after 20mins of wear! No good of you've got wide feet, same as with under armour boots. Very disappointed given they were £150!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Birkett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect....after a few miles
customer_reviews.text: I have to say after 10 miles or so these boots are almost perfect. I am usually size 10 but, opted for size 11 in this boot. From the beginning the boots still felt quite tight as I have reasonably wide feet, the length was fine so thought lets get walking. 10 miles and these boots feel ace, now done quite a few more mile and have to say these are a excellent choice, would highly recommend. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't begin to put the boot on !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots on the recommendation of a family member. I have wide and large feet, and when they arrived, the boots certainly looked wide enough. The snag was that, with the narrow internal gusset across the front of each boot, I couldn't begin to slide my feet into the boot itself. A very great pity, because they would have been perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Mr George G W Smith

customer_reviews.title: Its a top of the range Salomon, nuff said, awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: Its a top of the range Salomon, nuff said, awesome boots, have been wearing them for years great if your feet are slightly wider than average.
customer_reviews.author: Mr R-W

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable supportive boot.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out the box. After a few wears then completed a 13 mile 3 munro hike on grass, bog, rock and path with no issues or leakage. Very comfortable with good support round foot and ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Wattie

customer_reviews.title: Maybe go up one size
customer_reviews.text: Husband size 8 bought size 9 like his old ones. He’s impressed with them and I was with the price as £50 cheaper than Blacks. Delivered within 48hours too
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Very good boots bad Saller
customer_reviews.text: Boots are very good put one off the eyes had come out the Saller didn’t what to do anything emailed me send back to Spain I got the eye done in town for 5 pounds would not buy boots again on amizon
customer_reviews.author: Lyndon Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Best Footwear I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Immediately comfortable and just as comfortable after 30 miles. The lacing system helps to make the boots evenly comfortable on each foot. very good feature. Big and sturdy yet so lightweight that when the package was delivered I did not expect boots to be in the package. Makes it Ideal for my 30 mile walks and now I can walk everyday with no or significantly less aches. I can go further and faster. I cannot think of any negatives thus far. I am extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AshDobson

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from these boots.
customer_reviews.text: Used to be a top class boot,unfortunately only last 4/5 month now with only dog walking .Do Not Buy this product!..total waste of money as the sole rips right off,happened twice to me now so must be faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva D

customer_reviews.title: Great but leak.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this boot due to several positive reviews in the media. Very comfy and supportive. Great traction too. However after one season they were leaking like a sponge. Fortunately the vendor tested them and refunded me after returning.
customer_reviews.author: d a c griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box comfort, as good a grip as your ever going to get on claggy, slippy mud!
customer_reviews.author: RedAmberGreen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves this gift. But he says it wont be good for the summer. Its warm and makes your feet sweat
customer_reviews.author: Kay Campilan

customer_reviews.title: Wider around the toes
customer_reviews.text: My toes not feel squeezed as their were with the previous version. This boot reminds of the originals. A much better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Glenroy Ramocan

customer_reviews.title: Walking for miles.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, very good fit and comfortable. This is my 12th pair none have let me down (20yrs).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels very hard but you don't notice when walking
customer_reviews.text: Walking dog 5 miles a day feet are still good , marvelous
customer_reviews.author: andrewdleverett

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product no problems at all I would recommend these to anybody
customer_reviews.author: Rocke

customer_reviews.title: Would always recommend Salomon
customer_reviews.text: As described, Salomon are a great boot, perfect fit, very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and does the job in all conditions. I have used these in wet, rocky and boggy conditions. Feet stayed dry and felt stable on all surfaces. Very happy with these and would recommend. 👍
customer_reviews.author: D. Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Buy bigger size than normal
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even get past trying kn as it was so small Ioy just managed to squeeze my foot in. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: arsr58

customer_reviews.title: Build quality looks good. Support and cushioning is excellent although i did ...
customer_reviews.text: Build quality looks good. Support and cushioning is excellent although i did not have chance to test the boots. Not suitable for wide feet. That s why 4 our of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Equipment matched description exactly
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, ans lockable lace feature at lower neck area allow upper boot neck to be tied as loose or tight as you want without affecting how firm foot is in the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Warm, very comfortable. Very good grip in wet conditions & waterproof. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: S. Purnell

customer_reviews.title: delivery on time
customer_reviews.text: the post time and delivery spot on time as promised the boots are just brilliant light weight to walk in and comfortable not used them in any wet weather as yet no faults found as yet
customer_reviews.author: philip proctor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Boots
customer_reviews.text: Amazing boot, comfy, sturdy and not too heavy with great ankle protection. 10/10 best boots I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these, I've had few low tops and these hi tops were what I've needed
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Bad boys
customer_reviews.text: Tough and rugged the welsh mountains and torrential rain was no match for these bad boys
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Salomon gtx
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable boots wear them everyday for walks AAAAA+++++++
customer_reviews.author: Edward prince

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice the glue around the ages looks a bit sloppy but that's the only complaint so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan De'ath

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, and, light, as always order a half size bigger than normal. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: redereye

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's Quest 4d 3 GTX High Rise Hiking Boots
product_meta.description: Hiking boots Man SALOMON QUEST 4D 3 GTX L40151800
feature_bullets: WATERPROOF BACKPACKING SHOES: Designed for maximum traction on mixed terrain, the Quest 4D 3 hiking boot features our 4D Advanced Chassis to help guide the foot & reduce fatigue, even on the roughest terrain.

ANY PATH YOUR WAY: Light & cushioned with running shoe adapted technology, yet supportive enough for backpacking, the Quest 4D waterproof hiking boot helps you get to the next camp site with happier feet.

ADVENTURE AWAITS: Whether you love a local day hike or hitting the trails for a multi-day adventure, Salomon makes innovative hiking & backpacking shoes & boots for men & women to help you go the distance.
TIME TO PLAY: Whether you are into trail running, hiking, backpacking, or mountaineering, Salomon has shoes & gear for kids, men & women to help you conquer a new distance, personal record, or event!
SINCE 1947 Salomon has used our passion for outdoor sports & innovation to create progressive gear. Our road & trail running shoes, hiking sneakers, boots, & water shoes help make any path your own.
